data.title: PaaS, IaaS, Public, Private, Hybrid Solutions
data.meta_description: Directory, Reviews & Profiles for Amazon, Apprenda, Cloudera, Engine Yard, Google, HP, IBM, Joyent, Azure, Oracle, Pivotal, Salesforce.com, SAP & Rackspace.
data.text:
Accenture aims to solve business challenges for clients through industry knowledge and innovation. The vendor offers cloud services and cloud-based solutions that provide security, scalability and agility.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Accenture solves our clients’ toughest challenges by providing unmatched services in strategy, consulting, digital, technology and operations. With expertise across more than 40 industries and all business functions, we deliver transformational outcomes for a demanding new digital world..”

EC2 is a web service that provides resizable compute capacity in the cloud. It is designed to make web-scale computing easier for developers.

Download this Directory and get our Free Mobile Application Development Buyers Guide.

“Amazon EC2 presents a true cloud hosting service, allowing you to use web service interfaces to launch instances with a variety of operating systems, load them with your custom application environment, manage your network’s access permissions, and run your image using as many or few systems as you desire.”

Apprenda provides a foundational software layer and application run-time environment that abstracts away the complexities of building and delivering modern cloud applications.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Most PaaS offerings focus on providing deploy and manage value, which significantly reduces dev ops and IT burdens, but does little to accelerate application development or reduce project cost burdens. Apprenda provides a variety of architecture services and frameworks that satisfy a number of typical requirements and cross cutting concerns of most web and SOA apps.”

Lets you use Platform as a Service to host web applications to a dedicated environment optimized for .NET, Java, Ruby, Node.js, PHP and Python applications.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“CenturyLink Cloud Platform offers on-demand provisioning of high-performing virtual machines with any combination of operating system, storage, and memory. Our virtual servers rely on fully redundant enterprise-class hardware connected through private high-speed virtual LANs. Hyperscale instances offer higher storage performance for NoSQL workloads and web-scale architectures.”

An application-centric, cloud orchest-ration platform featuring an open architecture. Menu-driven web interface for administrators and users.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Based on open source Apache CloudStack, CloudPlatform is the industry’s most flexible and open cloud orchestration platform. Choose the hypervisor, storage and network technologies that are right for your cloud and leverage industry standard Amazon Web Service APIs and the rich partner ecosystem to expand and integrate value-added solutions and services.”

Cloudistics offers a software-driven platform with the same pay-as-you-grow economics as the public cloud. It’s easy to use and offers predictable performance, costs and control of data and apps.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Enterprises use Cloudistics on-premises cloud platform to achieve the same simplicity of the public cloud for on-premises applications. Cloudistics integrates hardware, virtualization software, and management software into a single platform..”

A cloud application management platform empowering developers and DevOps to provision, manage, monitor and control applications in the public and private cloud.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“We started Engine Yard to meet a genuine need—developers were building business-critical Ruby on Rails applications but didn’t want to worry about application deployment, management and scaling. We assist with small to large deployments, of any instance size, across a spectrum of applications ranging from SaaS, mobile, eCommerce, interactive websites, marketing campaigns and healthcare.”

Cloudera delivers a data management platform that’s powered by Hadoop. Cloudera Enterprise offers management software and support to form a scalable solution.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Cloudera is revolutionizing enterprise data management by offering the first unified Platform for Big Data: The Enterprise Data Hub. Cloudera offers enterprises one place to store, process and analyze all their data, empowering them to extend the value of existing investments while enabling fundamental new ways to derive value from their data.”

GigaSpaces’ Cloudify has automated scaling and support, and focuses on accelerating app and infrastructure life-cycle hybrid cloud management use cases. The cloud orchestration software platform automates installation, deployment and post-deployment processes.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“GigaSpaces provides the leading in-memory computing platform for fast data analytics and extreme transaction processing. With GigaSpaces InsightEdge Platform and its core engine XAP, organizations can overcome the complex obstacles of big data and advanced analytics to deliver real-time business impact..”

App Engine is a fully-managed PaaS with managed services, such as Task Queues, Memcache and the Users API. Compute Engine is an IaaS that lets you run workloads on virtual machines hosted on Google’s infrastructure.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Virtual machines. Managed platform. Blob storage. Block storage. NoSQL datastore. MySQL database. Big Data analytics Google Cloud Platform enables developers to build, test and deploy applications on Google’s highly-scalable and reliable infrastructure. Choose from computing, storage and application services for your web, mobile and backend solutions.”

HP offers a unified solution across private and public clouds. HP Helion is an open source- based, public cloud that integrates HP hardware and software with OpenStack technology.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“HP Cloud is built on a common architecture, powered by HP Cloud OS. We deliver the industry’s most comprehensive hybrid delivery strategy and solution portfolio across private, managed, and public clouds, as well as traditional IT. And we can even help you determine what type of cloud solution will work best for your business.”

IBM SmartCloud is a family of integrated enterprise-class cloud computing technologies and services for securely building and using private, public and hybrid clouds.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Built upon open standards combined with deep IBM expertise and best practices, SmartCloud is designed for complex high-performance computing environ-ments. SmartCloud goes beyond securely delivering new cloud efficiencies and cost savings to drive fundamental innovation for lasting marketplace advantage.”

Rapid Application Development kintone’s application platform allows users to build custom enterprise applications with no coding required. Applications can then be instantly and securely deployed to internal teams via the kintone iOS and Android mobile app container.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“The no-code/low-code rapid application movement is creating a new kind of business stakeholder: the citizen developer. While these users have intimate knowledge of specific process challenges weighing their company down, they may lack the coding expertise to build what they need. With no-code/low-code tools, business users’ visions can take shape quickly within a safe, IT-governed environment.”

Mendix is a software company headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts. Their aPaaS solution transforms ideas into applications. It was designed for businesses and IT teams, and aims to help them innovate faster. The enterprise-grade technology hides complexity and offers full runtime optimized for web-scale operations.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Our founders created Mendix to solve the biggest challenge in digital innovation: to empower IT and Business teams to collaborate like never before, while experiencing unmatched speed and control. These principles are architected into the very core of our platform, and they drive our relentless focus on your success..”

Azure supports any operating system, language, tool, and framework— from Windows to Linux, SQL Server to Oracle, C# to Java. Build and deploy a wide variety of applications for Android, iOS, and Windows. Azure also provides managed SQL and NoSQL data services.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Azure is Microsft’s cloud platform: a growing collection of integrated services—compute, storage, data, networking, and app. Azure is the only major cloud platform ranked by Gartner as an industry leader for both infrastructure-as-a-service (IaaS) and platform-as-a-service (PaaS). This powerful combination of managed and unmanaged services lets you build, deploy, and manage applications any way you like for unmatched productivity.”

Oracle Could Platform leverages standards-based shared services, and elastic scalability on demand and includes database functionality based on Oracle Database and Oracle Exadata Database Machine.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Oracle Cloud provides a shared and elastically scalable platform for consolidation of existing applications and new application development and deployment. The Oracle Cloud Platform delivers cost savings through standardization and higher utilization of the shared platform across multiple applications. Oracle offers a broad portfolio of software and hardware products and services to enable public, private, and hybrid clouds.”

OrangeScape, a PaaS provider founded in 2003, offers KiSSFLOW, a cloud-based platform to help business leaders create, modify and track automated business applications without IT support. KiSSFLOW has a human-centric design that allows users to build workflows with modern technology, and eliminates the need for complicated mapping.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“KiSSFLOW is a tool for IT directors to be able to hand over the power of business process management to leaders of business units. Since it is a platform, any business leader can create a unique form and workflow to facilitate a smooth process. We work very hard to make sure KiSSFLOW includes all of the most important features and also that the User Experience remains simple and human-centric.”

Platform is an open applications platform (Paas) solution designed for public and private cloud, on-premises or hybrid deployments. It combines full productivity and full application lifecycle management.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“OutSystems provides the open, rapid application delivery platform (PaaS) that makes it easy to develop apps once and deliver seamlessly across iOS, Android, Windows Phone, and Web – deeply integrated with existing cloud and on-premises databases and systems of record. OutSystems Platform enables rapid delivery of beautiful applications for all devices utilizing responsive or device-specific web design.”

An enterprise-cloud platform, powered by Cloud Foundry and VMware cloud infrastructure products Pivotal CF also allows data services to run on top of Cloud Foundry.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Pivotal CF is a comprehensive PaaS that can be deployed on multiple cloud environments to deliver a turnkey experience for scaling and updating PaaS with no downtime. Pivotal CF Services help create a PaaS ecosystem with differentiated data services such as Mobile, Hadoop, Visual Analytics, Messaging and MySQL.”

Red Hat has been around since 1993 and says they’re responsible for helping 90 percent of Fortune 500 companies solve their business challenges, align their IT strategies, and prep for the future. They provide their solutions through an open business model and a predictable subscription model.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Today, we deliver a comprehensive portfolio of products and services using the same open, collaborative business model and an affordable, predictable subscription.We work to make sure open source ideas influence and improve the collaborative good works of others, in every walk of life. Wherever people pull together to solve a shared problem, Red Hat wants to lend a hand.”

SAP HANA Cloud Platform is an open-standard, Eclipse-based modular platform as a service. Build, setup and deploy applications that feature mobile, collaboration, big data and analytics services.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Now more than ever, developers need the right platform to quickly extend, build and run cloud business applications. SAP HANA Cloud Platform is the Platform-as-a-Service purpose-built to meet the exacting needs of modern developers. With comprehensive services and capabilities, the world’s best developers depend on HANA Cloud Platform to build better apps in less time.”

Build apps with drag-and-drop components and design your apps specific to any screen — phone, tablet, laptop, desktop, or wearable. Leverage pre-built components from Salesforce and AppExchange partners, or have your developers write their own components.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

“Developers everywhere are using Force.com for business application development, creating cloud computing applications like enterprise resource planning (ERP), human resource management (HRM), and supply chain management (SCM). Force.com is a set of tools and services that make it faster and easier to create employee-facing applications that are instantly social and mobile. The Salesforce1 Platform allows you to create apps without worrying about hardware or infrastructure. So IT can focus solely on building apps and driving business results.”

ServiceNow, Inc. is a cloud computing company headquartered in California. It was first opened

in 2003 and offers everything-as-a-service cloud computing, including platform-as-a-service.

They have integration options for platforms such as Salesforce, JIRA, and SharePoint.

Download this Directory and get our Free Cloud Platform Solutions Buyers Guide.

Automate processes and orchestrate action across the enterprise, reuse components and integrations, and delegate application development with easy‑to‑use resources and drag‑and‑drop tools. Eliminate calls before they occur with self‑service, proactively prevent issues by assessing product or service health in real time, and engage the right resources to fix issues fast.

Solutions Review brings all of the technology news, opinion, best practices and industry events together in one place. Every day our editors scan the Web looking for the most relevant content about Endpoint Security and Protection Platforms and posts it here.
